name: Multi-Quest
description: Do you crave adventure? Cats? Maybe just something to take up time. Well all of that can be found here in Multi-Quest!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core Duo or AMD Phenom II processer with 64-bit support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct3D 11 technology Storage: 37 MB available space Sound Card: yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core Duo or AMD Phenom II processer with 64-bit support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Direct3D 11 technology Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: yes
